title: Game crashes after Champion Select, then cannot reconnect

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
Upon joining a game and entering champion select, everything is fine, however as soon as the selection finishes the game starts, but my client crashes and gets brought back to the client. From there I have the option to reconnect but it does nothing as seen in the GIF. I can't play the event even though I bought the pass yesterday.

I tried reinstalling League, that didn't help, I also have used the hextech repair tool and that failed. Does anyone have a solution to this?

replies.body:
I have to say, that gif is actually pretty mesmerizing, though I can imagine how infuriating it must be.

It almost looks like something is trying to block you from being able to reconnect to that game, since it does partially attempt to reconnect but only for a split second. Try going through and updating your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) paying attention to firewall and ports. Hit me back if that doesn't seem to help much!
